main.name: Elrond Olympian Gods
main.intro_description: Ten of the most representative Greek Gods from Olympus Mountain arose to conquer NFT Elrond marketplace.
main.quote: THE DICE OF ZEUS ALWAYS FALL LUCKILY.

about.title: About project
about.project_desc_p1: The Elrond Olympian Gods collection was created not only for the lovers of digital art and NFTs, but also for those who want to buy a valuable digital asset.
about.project_desc_p2: Taking into account that many people complained about NFTs being just pixel art, we decided to take it a step further by bringing you an NFT collection, containing 10 of the most famous Gods from Greek mythology.
about.project_desc_p3: Their history is well known throughout the whole world, this being the reason that we started this NFT project. Our purpose is to promote the Gods from the Olympus Mountain on Elrond NFT market place. We consider the history of the Olympian Gods to be indisputable.
about.project_desc_p4: Given the fact that digital art will become more and more valuable, we aim for Elrond Olympian Gods NFTs to reach their maximum value potential.
about.project_desc_p5: This way, we created 10.000 NFTs on Elrond network which will be listed for mint in different phases on TrustMarket.
about.project_desc_p6: Support Elrond Olympian Gods history to last over time in the upcoming battles that are taking place on NFT marketplace.

card1.title: Gaming
card1.desc: Our NFTs will help you enter into our amazing gaming world.

card2.title: Charity
card2.desc: Using our NFTs to help children without any financial support by providing them with the necessary devices in order to have access to a better school education.

card3.title: Partnerships
card3.desc: We will collaborate with other NFT projects to grow our collection`s value.

card4.title: Future projects
card4.desc: This part will be decided based on our members involvement and demand. We will create a Venture Capital Community to get allocations in future crypto projects.

card5.title: Rewards
card5.desc: Raffles of lkmex and EGLD will be distributed weekly to NFTs holders. An amount of EGLD will be staked in liquidity pools.

card6.title: Lottery
card6.desc: After every collection is sold out, 3 prizes consisting of 1000$ will be distributed randomly to 3 lucky NFT holder from the ongoing collection(200$ after 200 mints/300$ after 500 mints/500$ after sold out of every collection).

artist.title: Our artist
artist.artist_desc: Passionate about art (painting, graphic design, digital painting), NFTs, reading and video games. For the Horde!

question1.title: What is the collection's supply?
question1.content: The collection will contain 10.000 unique NFTs.

question2.title: On which blockchain will the collection be developed?
question2.content: The collection will be implemented on Elrond Blockchain.

question3.title: Where can I buy ElrondOlympianGods NFTs?
question3.content: You can mint our NFTs on TrustMarket using the links from our site.

question4.title: What is the mint price?
question4.content: The price for every collection will start from 0.4 EGLD for the first 500 NFTs. For the next 500 NFTs, the price will reach 0.7 EGLD.

question5.title: When can I mint them?
question5.content: The first minting phase will start on 15.04.2022 at 18:00 UTC

question6.title: Do you have Giveaways?
question6.content: Yes, we prepared a lot of giveaways for you and a lot of surprises. Follow us on our social media channels and accounts. Check also UTILITY section.
